name: qr-secret-decoder-ring
author: Brett Zamir

scripts.webext: npm run eslint && web-ext run --browser-console -f firefox
scripts.webext-beta: npm run eslint && web-ext run --browser-console -f beta
scripts.webext-nightly: npm run eslint && web-ext run --browser-console -f nightly
scripts.webext-dev: npm run eslint && web-ext run --browser-console -f firefoxdeveloperedition
scripts.copy: npm run copy-jamilih && npm run copy-polyfill

description: Right click an image or canvas (e.g., from https://www.the-qrcode-generator.com/ ) containing a QR code to decode. Allows internal decoding (using QR-Logo) or the choice of the ZXing and MiniQR websites for handling the decoding. MiniQR makes a public URL but conveniently converts URLs to links.
